Articles.Content:
Don't know if this is the right place to put this so here goes:

I'm streaming KSP live on twitch on http://www.twitch.tv/mrdraakos and i was wondering if anyone has some suggestions as to what I should do. Got interstellar and kethane installed.

I'm planning to do regular streams form this twitch account so let me know if you like the stream

Hope you enjoy the stream and sorry again if I'm posting this in the wrong place.
